amendment.description: To provide for financial and performance audits of the Iraq Relief and Reconstruction Fund and other assistance to Iraq.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1853 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1853 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator McCain. (consideration: CR S12655; text: CR S12655) To provide for financial and performance audits of the Iraq Relief and Reconstruction Fund and other assistance to Iraq.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1853 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1853 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator McCain.
